titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2016) to establish the National Landscape Conservation System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-573, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Natural Resources now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1084.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 190 (Roll no. 164).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 188 (Roll no. 165).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/9/2008--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2016 (National Landscape Conservation System Act).
